```{r}
library(r2dii.interactive)

load(system.file("example-data/test.rda", package = "r2dii.interactive"))

results_map <-
  bind_rows(
    "Listed Equity" = ungroup(equity_results_map),
    "Corporate Bonds" = ungroup(bonds_results_map),
    .id = "asset_class"
  )

exposure_map_data <- as_exposure_map_data(results_map)

exposure_map_chart(exposure_map_data)
```
